      • getTokenizationProcess

        @Deprecated
public java.lang.Process getTokenizationProcess(java.io.File inputFile)
                                         throws java.io.IOException
        Deprecated. 
        This method creates a process with some parameters for the tokenizer script. Deprecated: We use TreeTaggerTokenizer in the same package nowadays which implements the utf8-tokenize.perl script from the TreeTagger package. This fixes some issues with Perl's Unicode handling.
        Parameters:
        inputFile -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
